quote: To address this, we propose to automatically search for whole ML algorithms using little restriction on form and only simple mathematical operations as building blocks.
A common example is architecture search, which typically constrains the space by only employing sophisticated expert-designed layers as building blocks.
Our search method is similar but represents the program as a sequence of instructions.
We represent algorithms as computer programs that act on a small virtual memory with separate address spaces for scalar, vector and matrix variables.
